trans-unit.source: Represents a peer for which a user has retrieved extended information.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en node som en bruker har hentet tilleggsinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: A contact represents a trusted peer.
trans-unit.target: En kontakt representerer en klarert node.

trans-unit.source: A PeerContact object must be created for a remote peer or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> for a user to collaborate with the remote peer when it is outside of the "People Near Me" scope.
trans-unit.target: Et PeerContact-objekt må opprettes for en ekstern datamaskin eller <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>for brukere å samarbeide med den eksterne datamaskinen når den er utenfor området "Personer i nærheten".</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>

trans-unit.source: A PeerContact object can exist as either an application running on a remote computer, or the user of a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt for PeerContact kan være et program som kjører på en ekstern datamaskin eller bruker på en ekstern datamaskin.

trans-unit.source: An instance of this class can be added to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> which stores the contact information in a persistent manner.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av denne klassen kan legges til i <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>som lagrer kontaktinformasjonen i en fast måte.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>

trans-unit.source: An application invitation from a PeerContact is both authenticated and encrypted.
trans-unit.target: En applikasjon invitasjon fra en PeerContact er både godkjent og kryptert.

trans-unit.source: The UI dialog to accept or reject an invitation from a peer contact also indicates that that the inviter is trusted.
trans-unit.target: UI-dialogboksen for å godta eller avslå en invitasjon fra en node kontakt angir at at for personen som inviterte er klarert.

trans-unit.source: Subscribing to a PeerContact object means a remote peer can see its registered applications, objects and presence information.
trans-unit.target: Abonnerer på et PeerContact-objekt, en ekstern datamaskin kan se de registrerte programmene objekter og tilgjengelighetsinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: To subscribe to a PeerContact, the caller must be signed in to the peer collaboration infrastructure via <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> or signed in via the Windows UI.
trans-unit.target: For å abonnere på en PeerContact, Oppkalleren må være pålogget node samarbeid infrastruktur via <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>eller pålogget via Windows-Brukergrensesnittet.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>

trans-unit.source: All other operations do not require sign-in.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre operasjoner krever ikke pålogging.

trans-unit.source: No public constructor is defined for this class.
trans-unit.target: Ingen offentlig konstruktør er definert for denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: An instance of this object can be obtained from the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.GetContact%2A><xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContact%2A> or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.FromXml%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Kan hente en forekomst av dette objektet fra <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.GetContact%2A> <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContact%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.FromXml%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.FromXml%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.CreateContact%2A></xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.GetContact%2A>

trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en streng som representerer visningsnavnet for den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A display name may be used to differentiate contacts in a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> in instances where a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> may have multiple email addresses, or if there are multiple peers with the same display name.
trans-unit.target: Et visningsnavn kan brukes til å skille kontakter i en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>i tilfeller der en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>kan ha flere e-postadresser, eller hvis det er flere noder med samme visningsnavnet.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>

trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressurser og eventuelt frigir forvaltet ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> leaves a collaboration session, certain objects are no longer required.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>forlater en samarbeid økt bestemte objekter ikke lenger er nødvendige.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: If this contact had been collaborating with any other endpoint(s) not directly registered with the peer host, and the host expects to continue to collaborate with them, the host must register those endpoints within an application or within its <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> before disposing of this <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne kontakten har blitt samarbeider med andre endpoint(s) ikke direkte registrert i node-verten, og verten forventer fortsette å samarbeide med dem verten må registrere disse endepunkt i et program eller i den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>før kassering av dette <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>objektet.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress> object is used to represent the mail address.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress>objektet brukes til å representere e-postadresse.</xref:System.Net.Mail.MailAddress>

trans-unit.source: The Contact Manager allows for multiple email addresses within one instance.
trans-unit.target: Kontakt-behandling lar for flere e-postadresser i én forekomst.

trans-unit.source: This class is intended to be a lightweight implementation of a simple XML object model for use within the collaboration infrastructure, and not for use as a general XML object model.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen er ment å være en lett implementering av en enkel XML-objektmodell for bruk i samarbeid-infrastruktur, og ikke for bruk som en generell objektmodellen for XML.

trans-unit.target: Hvis kall node ikke som abonnerer på den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>knyttet til den angitte <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A>metoden må kalles før du kaller denne metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: While the caller is not required to sign-in to the collaboration infrastructure for this method to complete successfully, a successful call to <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A> or one of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> methods must have been completed while the caller was previously signed in.
trans-unit.target: Under oppkalleren ikke er nødvendig å logge på samarbeid infrastrukturen for denne metoden skal fullføres, en vellykket kall til <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A>eller én av <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>metodene må ha fullført mens oppkalleren var tidligere logget på.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A>

trans-unit.source: This functionality is not exposed on any other type of peer for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonaliteten er ikke eksponert på andre typer node av sikkerhetsgrunner.

trans-unit.target: Også brukes til å identifisere den asynkrone operasjonen for annullering.

trans-unit.source: This parameter must be specified and is unique across all asynchronous invitation operations in progress.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren må være angitt, og er unike på tvers av alle asynkrone invitasjonen operasjoner pågår.

trans-unit.source: - UserToken cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: - UserTokenkan ikke være null.

trans-unit.source: - Endpoint specified by peerEndPoint cannot be .
trans-unit.target: -Endepunktet angitt av peerEndPoint ikke .

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> and <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> objects cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null." name="null." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>og <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> objekter kan ikke<xref uid="langword_csharp_null." name="null." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id*> for the current application does not exist or is empty.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id*>for dette programmet finnes ikke eller er tom.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the current <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> is subscribed or unsubscribed to an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om gjeldende <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> abonnerer eller abonnementet til et endepunkt.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this property gets or sets a value specifying whether the current peer host or hosting application has subscribed or unsubscribed to this <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også egenskapen henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den gjeldende node-vert verts-programmet har abonnerer eller abonnementet til denne <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: In many instances, a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> is not the same as a peer host.
trans-unit.target: I mange tilfeller en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>er ikke det samme som en node-vert.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: A peer host has an instance within the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> of the remote peer, and the relationship is that they have invited the peer to collaborate.
trans-unit.target: En node-vert er en forekomst i den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>for den eksterne datamaskinen, og relasjonen er at de har invitert node å samarbeide.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>

trans-unit.source: An endpoint has a "Me" instance within its own contact manager and the peer host, but the relationship is not specified.
trans-unit.target: Et sluttpunkt har en "meg" serverforekomsten i sin egen kontakt behandling og node-verten, men relasjonen er ikke angitt.

trans-unit.source: If the peer host is in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>, and the peer contact chooses not to <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>, its <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.SubscriptionType> can have a value of blocked, rather than deleting its entry from the host Contact Manager.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verten node i den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>, og den node-kontakten velger ikke til <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>, den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.SubscriptionType>kan ha en verdi for blokkert, i stedet for å slette oppføringen fra verten kontakt Manager.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.SubscriptionType> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>

trans-unit.source: There is a many-to-many relationship between local peers, remote peers, peer hosts, and subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: Det er en mange-til-mange-relasjon mellom lokale motpartene, eksterne motpartene, node verter og abonnementer.

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions are per user, rather than per process, per application, or per domain.
trans-unit.target: Abonnementer er per bruker, i stedet for prosessen, program eller domene.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the subscriptions associated with a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> object are the list of contacts to which it has subscribed and from which it expects updates.
trans-unit.target: Derfor hvilke abonnementer som er knyttet til en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>objekt er listen over kontakter den har abonnert og som det forventes at oppdateringer.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: Those contacts either have updated their own application, object, and presence information, or they have updated information regarding contacts in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>.
trans-unit.target: Disse kontaktene enten har oppdatert sine egne application-objektet og tilgjengelighetsinformasjon, eller de har oppdatert informasjon om kontakter i <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `true` if the object is a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> which represents the local or "Me" contact, since a contact is always subscribed to itself.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer alltid `true` Hvis objektet er en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>som representerer lokalt eller "Meg" kontakt, fordi en kontakt abonneres alltid til seg selv.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> is subscribed to this endpoint, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the contact has not subscribed or has unsubscribed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> som abonnerer på dette endepunktet <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis kontakten ikke har abonnerer eller har abonnementet.

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string which represents the Nickname of the .
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en streng som representerer den Nickname av den .

trans-unit.source: A Nickname can be used for a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> object in case there are multiple peers with the same display name.
trans-unit.target: Et kallenavn kan brukes for en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>objekt i tilfelle det er flere noder med samme visningsnavnet.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: A collaboration session can also use the nickname to designate remote peers commonly used in larger collaboration efforts.
trans-unit.target: En økt som samarbeid kan også bruke kallenavnet til å angi eksterne noder som ofte brukes i større samarbeid forsøk.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> which represents the nickname of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>som representerer kallenavn for den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for denne egenskapen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen signalisert når en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> er endret.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.ApplicationChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.ApplicationChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Application changes occur when an application is launched, registered or unregistered from the collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Programmet endringer oppstår når et program startes, registreres eller avregistreres fra samarbeid-infrastruktur.

trans-unit.source: They also occur when peers join or leave a collaboration session or change network endpoint locations.
trans-unit.target: De også oppstå når motpartene bli forlate en samarbeid økt eller endre nettverksplasseringer sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: Peer scope changes may also effect a change in an application.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i node omfang kan også påvirke en endring i en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som arver fra denne klassen kan overstyre denne metoden hvis du vil utføre flere aktiviteter når hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ApplicationChangedEventArgs"></xref> object to be passed to delegates associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.ApplicationChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ApplicationChangedEventArgs"> </xref> objektet som skal sendes til representant som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.ApplicationChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.ObjectChanged"></xref> event when a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> is added, updated or removed by a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.ObjectChanged"> </xref> hendelse når en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> legges til, oppdatere eller fjernet av en ekstern datamaskin.

trans-unit.source: Type of object change specified by <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ObjectChangedEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Typen objekt endringer som er angitt av <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ObjectChangedEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PresenceChanged"></xref> event when the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"></xref> of a peer has changed.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PresenceChanged"> </xref> hendelsen når den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"> </xref> av en node er endret.

trans-unit.source: Presence changes occur when a peer signs out of an application, an application is registered or unregistered from the collaboration infrastructure, or a peer unsubscribes from a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>.
trans-unit.target: Tilstedeværelse endringer skje når en node logger av et program, et program registreres eller avregistreres fra samarbeid-infrastruktur, eller en node avsluttede abonnementer fra en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>eller <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PresenceChangedEventArgs"></xref> object to be passed to delegates associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PresenceChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PresenceChangedEventArgs"> </xref> objektet som skal sendes til representant som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PresenceChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.SubscribeCompleted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.SubscribeCompleted> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som arver fra denne klassen kan overstyre denne metoden for å utføre flere aktiviteter når den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.SubscribeCompleted>inntreffer.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.SubscribeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.SubscribeCompletedEventArgs"></xref> or <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.SubscriptionListChangedEventArgs"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.SubscribeCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.SubscribeCompletedEventArgs"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.SubscriptionListChangedEventArgs"> </xref> tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.SubscribeCompleted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"> </xref> knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Whether a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> is a local peer, remote peer, or host peer for the peer contact represented by this instance is not relevant to the presence of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> in either the endpoint <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection> or the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>.
trans-unit.target: Om en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>er en lokal node, eksterne datamaskinen eller verten node for node-kontakten representert av denne forekomsten er ikke relevant for tilstedeværelsen av <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>i enten endpoint <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection>eller <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> collection associated with this <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> samlingen knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Ingen to kontakter i adresseboken kan ha samme <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: Subscribes the calling peer to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>, and as a result, the peer will receive any future <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> events associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Abonnerer kall motparten til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref>, og derfor motparten mottar alle fremtidige <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"> </xref> hendelser som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> updates occur asynchronously after the Subscribe method has succeeded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>oppdateringer oppstå asynkront når metoden Abonner er fullført.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: As a result, it is possible for a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> to be added to the collection of a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> before the associated <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.Name%2A> is provided.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet er det mulig for en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>som skal legges til i samlingen i et <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>før den tilknyttede <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.Name%2A>er angitt.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.Name%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: To monitor these changes, it is recommended that the user subscribe to the relevant events; for example, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.NameChanged>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overvåke disse endringene, anbefales det at brukeren abonnerer på de relevante hendelsene; for eksempel <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.NameChanged>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.NameChanged>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the peer collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når økten node samarbeid starter.

trans-unit.source: The calling peer is not signed in to People Near Me.
trans-unit.target: Kall motparten er ikke pålogget personer i nærheten.

trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Unable to complete Subscribe operation.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke fullføre Abonner operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Failure may be due to an inability to establish a TCP connection to the peer.
trans-unit.target: Feilen kan skyldes ikke kan opprette en TCP-tilkobling til den eksterne maskinen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> is exposed to the collaboration events associated with the peer or application that has ownership of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"></xref> in which this <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object resides.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> er utsatt for samarbeid hendelser som er knyttet til node eller et program som er eier av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager"> </xref> som <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> objektet finnes.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.SubscriptionType>means the remote peer specified by this <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> can see the registered applications, objects and presence information for the user or application that owns the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> in which this <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> object resides.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen settes <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.SubscriptionType>betyr at den eksterne datamaskinen som er angitt av dette <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>kan se registrerte programmer, objektene og tilgjengelighetsinformasjon for brukeren eller programmet som eier av <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>som <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>målet.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.SubscriptionType>

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect on a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> instance that represents the local or "Me" contact, since a contact is always subscribed to itself.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på et <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>-forekomst som representerer lokalt eller "Meg" kontakt, fordi en kontakt abonneres alltid til seg selv.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.SubscriptionType"></xref> enumeration value that specifies whether this <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> is exposed to collaboration events belonging to the peer host or hosting application.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.SubscriptionType"></xref>opplistingsverdi som angir om dette <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> er utsatt for samarbeid hendelser som hører til node verten eller vert for programmet.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously subscribes the calling peer to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>, and as a result, the peer will receive any future <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"></xref> events associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Abonnerer asynkront kall motparten til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref>, og derfor motparten mottar alle fremtidige <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration"> </xref> hendelser som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref>.
